summary: A Metropolitan Correctional Center memorandum dated August 12, 2019, documenting information passed from the Special Housing Unit on August 9, 2019, regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein. It notes that Epstein was going to WAB (likely the Westchester Annex Building or a similar facility) and might not return, and that he would need a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate referenced in the memorandum, identified by inmate number #7631, who was going to WAB and might not return, and who would need a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit.

events.title: Information passed regarding Epstein's movement
events.description: On August 9, 2019, at approximately 1:50 PM, information was passed from the Special Housing Unit to oncoming staff that inmate Jeffrey Epstein was going to WAB and might not return, and that he would need a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York
WAB (likely Westchester Annex Building or similar facility)
keyFacts: The document is a government memorandum from the Metropolitan Correctional Center dated August 12, 2019.
It references information passed on August 9, 2019, regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein's movement to WAB and his potential non-return.
It notes that Epstein would need a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit.
The document includes redacted names of staff members (e.g., Officer ...).
Epstein's inmate numbers are listed as #85993-054 and #7631.
